snippet.title: Blub Emporium Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592530/Blub_Emporium/

Decorate and manage your very own shop, terraform and farm on a massive landscape, and configure a network of machines to manufacture different resources. Blub Emporium is a colourful and quirky sandbox management game about providing a commercial haven for this universe's sole inhabitants.

Blub Emporium is an isometric sandbox management indie game solo developed by me, It's certainly a niche game but will appeal to you if you like Building/decorating, farming or automation puzzles!

Gameplay in the trailer is of the beta build of Blub Emporium. Some things shown are subject to change as the game progresses to release. Blub Emporium is targeted to release in 2021.
---------------------------------------------
Music:
Jordan Clark - Faded Sunset (https://youtu.be/sempqLaFnhY)
Jordan Clark - Sunday Night (https://youtu.be/5nSBXgOleSU)
Jordan Clark - Drifting Thoughts (https://youtu.be/d97n2BgcfF8)
---------------------------------------------
Social Media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RileyJGray
